message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I really appreciate it, but $180 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend.  I'm willing to pay $120 for it.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $150. What do you think?
